name: Clocked out (greenman4890)
description:
Hello if you're looking for a short  fun, colourful platformer with a cute time manipulation mechanic this is the game you want to play.

Manipulate the time stream making sure your timer doesn't run out when you overuse it.  If you let it run out the game becomes a lot more difficult.

I took inspiration by old cartoons for the characters, and went for a colorful style with the level design. I hope you like it, thanks for checking out my gamejam. I made this in roughly two weeks using unreal 5.

I don't know what part of assets I need to make sure to mention, but i'll play it safe and mention these assets I used and modified to fit my project all royalty free or bought:

Ultra dynamic sky
CartoonWatershader/celshader
PostProcessshaderpackv1.2
Some kenney icons
UltimateSFX&Music bundle
https://pixabay.com/vectors/smiley-faces-emoji-emoticons-5889752/
Polygon Prototype(Synty studio)
https://pixabay.com/vectors/alarm-time-clock-alarm-clock-5961342/?download
